StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEnlistedPoolBoardPoolees]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@BeginDate date.me = null ,@OrgId int )
AS SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Name ,n.NWA_ID AS NwaId ,n.rowguid AS NwaRowGuid ,mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE AS EnlistmentDate ,case when EXISTS (SELECT PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID) then CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), c.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, 106) else CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), mi.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, 106) end AS ProjectedShipDate ,Program = CASE --WHEN c.COMPONENT_CODE in ('K4','B5','K8','K9' ) THEN m.BILLET_MOS --According to Joe Walker, the Program is from QSN.MOS for the following COMPONENT_CODE, K4, B5, K8, K9 WHEN c.COMPONENT_CODE in ('K4','B5','K8','K9' ) THEN ( SELECT TOP 1 qsn.MOS FROM [dbo].[QSN] qsn WHERE qsn.CONTRACT_id=c.[CONTRACT_ID] ORDER BY qsn.[PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE] DESC ) ELSE (SELECT TOP 1 p.[PROGRAM_CODE] FROM [dbo].[PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY] pa INNER JOIN [PROGRAM] p ON p.[PROGRAM_ID] = pa.[PROGRAM_ID] WHERE pa.[CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] ORDER BY pa.[PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE] DESC) END ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[REFERRAL] r WHERE r.[DEP_CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] OR r.[MARINE_ID] = n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID]) AS EnlistmentCredits ,(SELECT TOP 1 hs.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] ce LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[HIGH_SCHOOL] hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = ce.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE ce.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND ce.VERIFICATION = 'VERIFIED' ORDER BY ce.UPDATE_DATE DESC) AS HighSchool ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterName ,CASE mc.[GENDER_CODE] WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE 'NotSpeci.ed' END AS GenderCode ,COALESCE( CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'R' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'M' THEN 'RegularMaleNonPriorService' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'R' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'F' THEN 'RegularFemaleNonPriorService' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'G' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'M' THEN 'MaleReserveGround' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'A' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'M' THEN 'MaleReserveAir' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] IN ('G', 'A') AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'F' THEN 'FemaleReserve' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'P' THEN 'PriorService' END ) AS CategoryCode ,cs.[STATUS_CODE] ,cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE] FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[MIContract] mi ON mi.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[CONTRACT] c ON c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[SHIPPER] s ON s.CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc ON n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = mc.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Marine m ON p.Person_ID = m.Marine_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rcrtr.PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID and cs.[CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID] = (Select max ( [CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID] ) from [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] where NWA_ID=n.NWA_ID ) WHERE n.[ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID] = @OrgId AND s.SHIP_DATE IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs WHERE cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID AND cs.STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND cs.STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'L') AND ( (@BeginDate IS NULL OR c.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE BETWEEN @BeginDate AND DATEADD(d, -1, DATEADD(m, 1, @BeginDate))) OR ((NOT EXISTS (SELECT CONTRACT_ID FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID)) and (@BeginDate IS NULL OR mi.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE BETWEEN @BeginDate AND DATEADD(d, -1, DATEADD(m, 1, @BeginDate)))) ) ORDER BY mi.[PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE]
